attributes.action: Strengthen consumer protections on new build homes
attributes.additional_details: We believe the standards of housebuilding might only get worse with the government wanting more houses built each year. We feel these companies are not providing new homeowners of a standard of quality they assume they are paying for.
attributes.background:
Consumer protections should be strengthened by requiring developers to: 
1) Meet stricter quality control standards before sale.
2) Refund 10% of the home's value if it falls below a set standard
3) Cover the cost of alternative accommodation if buyers are not happy.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government
